hero.title: How does Seated work?
hero.subtitle: Discover unique culinary experiences in Wroc≈Çaw. We connect food lovers with talented hosts in an intimate atmosphere.

steps.title: 5 simple steps
steps.subtitle: From discovery to experience - the whole process is simple and intuitive

step1.title: 1. Find an event
step1.description: Browse our culinary events in Wroc≈Çaw. Filter by cuisine type, date or location. From intimate dinners to cooking workshops.

step2.title: 2. Book your spot
step2.description: Choose a convenient date and number of people. Secure online payment. You'll receive confirmation and event details by email.

step3.title: 3. Get the location
step3.description: 24h before the event you'll receive the exact address and directions. Most events take place in private homes or unique locations.

step4.title: 4. Enjoy the experience
step4.description: Meet new people, discover amazing flavors and enjoy a unique atmosphere. It's more than food - it's an experience.

step5.title: 5. Leave a review
step5.description: After the event you can rate the host and share your impressions. Your opinion helps others find the best experiences.
